The Seven Deadly Sins, a group of evil knights who conspired to overthrow the kingdom of Britannia, were said to have been eradicated by the Holy Knights, although some claim that they still live. Ten years later, the Holy Knights have staged a coup d'Ã©tat and assassinated the king, becoming the new, tyrannical rulers of the kingdom. Elizabeth, the king's third daughter, sets out on a journey to find the \"Seven Deadly Sins\", and to enlist their help in taking back the kingdom.

The series traces the history of the seven deadly sins, how they became part of religious doctrine, and looks at historical figures who have been the worst perpetrators of each. Each of the seven sins is explored, from their origins and nature, their opposing virtue, and their corresponding punishment.

The prideful archangel Lucifer disobeys God and is cast into the lowest level of hell as a fallen angel. On her way to hell, Lucifer happens to meet a high school girl on Earth named Maria, who helps her. In hell, Lucifer meets Leviathan, and Leviathan explains to Lucifer about The Seven Deadly Sins, the seven demon king rulers of hell. After The Seven Deadly Sins seal Lucifer's powers, Lucifer goes on a journey with Maria and Leviathan to defeat them.

","updated":1573750944,"_links":{"self":{"href":"http://api.tvmaze.com/shows/25980"},"previousepisode":{"href":"http://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/1104840"}}}},{"score":7.2213755,"show":{"id":7207,"url":"http://www.tvmaze.com/shows/7207/7-deadly-sins","name":"7 Deadly Sins","type":"Documentary","language":"English","genres":["Comedy","Adult"],"status":"Ended","runtime":30,"premiered":"2014-08-07","officialSite":"http://www.sho.com/sho/7-deadly-sins/home","schedule":{"time":"23:00","days":["Thursday"]},"rating":{"average":null},"weight":70,"network":{"id":9,"name":"Showtime","country":{"name":"United States","code":"US","timezone":"America/New_York"}},"webChannel":null,"externals":{"tvrage":41598,"thetvdb":282547,"imdb":"tt3735164"},"image":{"medium":"http://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_portrait/26/67134.jpg","original":"http://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/26/67134.jpg"},"summary":"

Dark, twisted and wildly entertaining, 7 Deadly Sins proves that truth really is stranger than fiction. Acclaimed, Oscar-nominated documentary filmmaker Morgan Spurlock presents an outrageous, modern day interpretation of the seven deadly sins: lust, gluttony, greed, sloth, wrath, envy, and pride. Each episode presents a story around one of the sins that is so extreme you won't believe it's non-fiction. It's humanity like you've never seen it, and you won't be able to look away.
